thread.section_title: Travelrepublic Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Travelrepublic | www.travelrepublic.ie
thread.title: Tony murray

author: Tony murray
title: Tony murray
text: Having used t/r on numerous occasions traveled to NYC hotel reception had no record of booking I contacted t/r who checked it said they sort it and ring back in 30 min I received call back 20 min later with booking ref took it to reception all sorted received another call 10 min later to check everything OK very happy with excellent service from t/r staff
